results.text: Suppose one of you wants to build a tower. Won't you first sit down and estimate the cost to see if you have enough money to complete it?
results.reason: This verse highlights the importance of considering the cost before undertaking a significant project.
results.reflection: Wise planning and foresight are crucial when investing in new technologies.

results.text: The plans of the diligent lead to profit as surely as haste leads to poverty.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes the value of diligent planning to avoid unnecessary expenses.
results.reflection: Thoughtful and careful planning can lead to successful outcomes in costly ventures.

results.text: For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
results.reason: This verse suggests reflecting on what we value most and where we choose to invest our resources.
results.reflection: Evaluate whether AI is truly where you want to invest your 'treasure' and focus.

results.text: The rich rule over the poor, and the borrower is slave to the lender.
results.reason: This verse warns about the potential pitfalls of financial obligations and debt.
results.reflection: Be cautious of the financial implications and commitments when investing in AI.

results.text: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil. Some people, eager for money, have wandered from the faith and pierced themselves with many griefs.
results.reason: This verse reminds us of the dangers of prioritizing financial gain over spiritual well-being.
results.reflection: Ensure that the pursuit of AI does not lead you away from your core values and beliefs.
